EmailTemplate.name: 2019_NBAA_Keselowski_Invite.2019_NBAA_Keselowski_Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Registration Confirmed - "Learn How Checkered Flag Aviation Wins with Primus Elite"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're now registered to "Learn How Checkered Flag Aviation Wins with Primus Elite"
Here are the details:
Location: NBAA - Las Vegas Convention Center, Room N256 Date: Tuesday, October 22, 2019 Time: 2:00 p.m. - 3:00 p.m.
Please contact Ed.Borger@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Ed.Borger@Honeywell.com]]> if you have any questions. See you there!
Best,
Brad, Joey, and the Honeywell Team
